thag2.16:1.1_0: Thereâ€™s a big black woman who looks like a crow.
thag2.16:1.2_0: She broke off thigh-bones, first one then another;
thag2.16:1.3_0: she broke off arm-bones, first one then another;
thag2.16:1.4_0: she broke off a skull like a curd-bowl, and then
thag2.16:2.1_0: When an ignorant person builds up attachments,
thag2.16:2.2_0: that idiot returns to suffering again and again.
thag2.16:2.3_0: So let one who understands not build up attachments:
thag2.16:2.4_0: may I never again lie with a broken skull!
thag2.16:2.5_0: ... a senior monk who was very a senior monk ...
